content.question: Which of the following developments in the period after 1945 most directly prevented localized conflicts such as the one illustrated in the two photographs from escalating into global wars?

choices.label: The threat of the use of nuclear weapons
The effectiveness of the United Nations as a global guarantor of collective security
Recurring economic downturns, such as the one following the 1973 OPEC oil embargo
The threat of communist revolutions breaking out in the industrialized countries of the West

content.answer: The threat of the use of nuclear weapons
